import { useState } from 'react' import { Link, withRouter, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import * as auth from '../utils/auth' function Register() { const [signinCredentials, setSigninCredentials] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }) const { username, email, password, confirmPassword } = signinCredentials let history = useHistory() const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setSigninCredentials({ [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (password === confirmPassword) { auth.register(username, password, email).then((res) => { if (res) { history.push('/login') } else { console.log('Something went wrong.') } }) } } return (
